mapper.update: update review set url = #{reviewUrl}, status = 'WRITTEN' where seq = #{reviewSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT r.seq, nsbi.store_name, r.status, r.url, e.visit_date, r.created_at FROM review r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.store_seq = u.seq LEFT JOIN national_store_business_information nsbi ON u.business_number = nsbi.business_number LEFT JOIN experience e ON r.experience_seq = e.seq WHERE r.customer_seq = #{userSeq} ORDER BY r.created_at ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
